mean_en: a feeling of being satisfied with how things are and not wanting to try to make them better :a complacent feeling or condition
sentence: It is dangerous to fall into the trap of complacency in life.
sentence_trans: 生活中陷入自满的陷阱是很危险的。
word_etyma: com前缀，加强语气 + plac取悦 + ency表名词 → 被取悦 → complacency自满
